entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 18. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
